title: Expedition: New River
creator_credit: Michael Perry and Australia and New Zealand School Exploration Society
brief_description: Contains information of the expedition of secondary school students to the Tasmanian South West with comments on expedition medicine, equipment and rations. Value to scientists and bushwalkers.
